title: Severed leg

properties.name: description
properties.value: A severed leg is a fun weapon that can be obtained from a corpse cart, which are found around Darkmeyer, accessed after the completion of the Sins of the Father quest.

content:
This article is about the severed leg found in Darkmeyer. For the severed leg obtained during The General's Shadow, see Severed leg (The General's Shadow).
Severed leg
Released4 June 2020 (Update)
MembersYes

ExamineA severed human leg.

Weight1.8 kg
Advanced data
Item ID24792

A severed leg is a fun weapon that can be obtained from a corpse cart, which are found around Darkmeyer, accessed after the completion of the Sins of the Father quest.

Equipping the severed leg allows players to "Whack" other players like the rubber chicken does, but cannot be fumbled like it, and thus is never forcefully dropped on the ground.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
12 June 2020
(update)

The severed leg was given negative stats and its attack speed changed from 3 to 4 to match other fun weapons.

[[File:Severed leg detail.png|left|130px]]
A '''severed leg''' is a [[fun weapon]] that can be obtained from a [[corpse cart]], which are found around [[Darkmeyer]], accessed after the completion of the [[Sins of the Father]] [[quest]]. 

Equipping the severed leg allows players to "Whack" other players like the [[rubber chicken]] does, but cannot be fumbled like it, and thus is never forcefully dropped on the ground.
